channel.title: Comments on: White Chocolate Mud Cake

item.title: By: Leela@SheSimmers
item.dc:creator: Leela@SheSimmers
item.description: Anita, this cake looks divine -- so moist and gooey. This is the kind of cake I like; I'm not a fan of poofy, light-as-cloud cakes. I will definitely try this recipe.
item.content:encoded: Anita, this cake looks divine — so moist and gooey. This is the kind of cake I like; I’m not a fan of poofy, light-as-cloud cakes. I will definitely try this recipe.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: Ooh! You don't see many White Chocolate Mud Cakes around...sounds like it would be really good!
item.content:encoded: Ooh! You don’t see many White Chocolate Mud Cakes around…sounds like it would be really good!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi All
Hi Arwen - I'm looking forward to making the hazelnut version too, I'm just trying to find time and a reason to make it (after Easter, I think I've made too much :)
Hi Sara - Thanks, this really was a delicious cake.
Hi Simon - Yep, it is definitely an artery filler :)
Hi Lorraine - Thanks, the icing drips weren't meant to be drips... it was meant to cover the cake... :) glad it looks good though :)
Hi Barbara - It was quite dense and moist and very delicious!
Hi Maria - Thanks, the cake wasn't as sweet as I thought it might be, the icing was quite sweet (and I made less icing) :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi All

Hi Arwen – I’m looking forward to making the hazelnut version too, I’m just trying to find time and a reason to make it (after Easter, I think I’ve made too much ðŸ™‚

Hi Sara – Thanks, this really was a delicious cake.

Hi Simon – Yep, it is definitely an artery filler ðŸ™‚

Hi Lorraine – Thanks, the icing drips weren’t meant to be drips… it was meant to cover the cake… ðŸ™‚ glad it looks good though ðŸ™‚

Hi Barbara – It was quite dense and moist and very delicious!

Hi Maria – Thanks, the cake wasn’t as sweet as I thought it might be, the icing was quite sweet (and I made less icing) ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: As soon as I saw the first picture of the cake, I involuntarily let out a small moan. That looks so delicious I want a piece now! I've never attempted to make white chocolate mud cake before, I would imagine that it would be pretty sweet.
item.content:encoded: As soon as I saw the first picture of the cake, I involuntarily let out a small moan. That looks so delicious I want a piece now! I’ve never attempted to make white chocolate mud cake before, I would imagine that it would be pretty sweet.

item.title: By: Barbara Bakes
item.dc:creator: Barbara Bakes
item.description: This is the first mud cake that I've seen. It looks really dense, moist and delicious!
item.content:encoded: This is the first mud cake that I’ve seen. It looks really dense, moist and delicious!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Yum! I love the icing drips, they're so alluring!
item.content:encoded: Yum! I love the icing drips, they’re so alluring!

item.title: By: Simon Food Favourites
item.dc:creator: Simon Food Favourites
item.description: looks delicious! nothing like a freshly baked cake to fill the arteries. s :-)
item.content:encoded:
looks delicious! nothing like a freshly baked cake to fill the arteries.
s ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sara
item.dc:creator: Sara
item.description: This looks delicious, I really love white chocolate!
item.content:encoded: This looks delicious, I really love white chocolate!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: It looks like a good rich cake. I'm looking forward to the hazelnut version.
item.content:encoded: It looks like a good rich cake. I’m looking forward to the hazelnut version.
